violations.description: James Wang is wearing a black badge which is not allowed in the restricted zone.
violations.recommendation: Remove James Wang from the restricted zone and ensure he wears an authorized badge.

report.summary: The observation is non-compliant due to James Wang being in the restricted zone with an unauthorized badge. The risk score indicates a high level of risk.
